300465.「ヴァリーブートキャンプに挑戦するなら\n オレっちに 言ってくれ。\n さあ:
If you wanna try out the Valley Boot Camp,
just let me know. So, what can I do for
you today?
<break>

300467.「また いつでも 来てくれよな！\n 大魔王様！\n<end>: I hope you'll be back soon, Great Demon King!<end>

300471.「……悪いな。\n 今は 確認できるランキングは\n 無いみたいだ。\n<bw_:
Sorry...but it looks like there aren't any
rankings available right now.<bw_break>

300472.「どれどれ 大魔王様の記録は……\n<br>\n「って おいおい！\n ヴァリー:
Let's see, the Great Demon King's record... Where could it...
Hey, wait! You haven't even attempted the Valley Boot Camp yet!
Once you do and set some records, I'll keep all of your high score neatly recorded and you can check them anytime you want.

300473.「これが 大魔王様の実績だ！\n<end>:
Here's a list of your current achievements!
<end>

300475.「ん？ それは まだ渡せないもののようだ。\n<bw_break>:
Huh? I can't give that to you just yet, sorry.
<bw_break>

300476.「ん？ それは もう渡したものだな。\n 悪いが 特別報酬は 一度きりなんだ。\:
Huh? I already gave you that reward. I can't
give you another one.
<bw_break>

300477.「ん？ 荷物が いっぱいじゃないか。\n <%sM_Fukuro>を 整理してか:
Huh? Looks like you're carrying too much
stuff. Go make some room in your
<%sM_Fukuro> and come back.
<bw_break>

300478.「この <%sM_ITEM>を\n 受け取るんだな？\n<yesno><clos:
You'd like me to give you the
<%sM_ITEM>?
<yesno><close>

300480.「ハッハッハ！ さすがだな。\n この調子で 次も がんばってくれよな。\n<b:
Hahaha! Now that's what I'm talking about!
Keep it up for next time, yeah?
<bw_break>

300481.「ん？ ちょっとまてよ……。\n<br>\n「この報酬を 受け取れるということは:
Hm? Wait a sec...
So, receiving this reward means you've achieved "<%sM_AchieveName>"?

300482.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ワッハッハ！:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Hahaha! You truly are a spectacle to behold!
Of course, I'd have no doubt someone
recognized by Valeria herself could do it!
<bw_break>

300484.「ヴァリーブートキャンプでは こちらで用意した\n 修練用のモンスターに できる:
Here at Valley Boot Camp, the goal is to try to deal as much damage to a monster we've prepared for the highest score!
Even the Great Demon King can't destroy these monsters, so don't be afraid to go all out!
The boot camp can either be challenged alone or with a group of other adventurers.
However, damage caused by other adventurers or inflicted ailments won't count towards your score.
Gotta win with your own power!

300485.「戦闘が始まると 途中でアイテムが出現する。\n このアイテムは 拾った本人にだ:
When the battle begins, items will soon appear. Whoever picks them up will get a nice boost, but only they will get it.
But, the items won't disappear if someone else gets to them first! Don't hesitate to pick 'em up too!
There are several different types of items, so be sure to try 'em all out.

300486.「戦闘終了の ３０秒前になると\n ボーナスタイムに突入する！ この間は\n な:
30 seconds before the battle ends, Bonus Time will start! When that happens, all dealt damage will be doubled!
Also when Bonus Time starts, Special skills and Pep will be triggered.
So, when you see Bonus Time, it's time to go all out and deal loads of damage! Get the highest score you can!

300487.「もし 戦闘中に死亡したら 他の冒険者から\n 見えなくなり どんな方法を使った:
If you die in battle, that's it! You're done! You'll be invisible to other adventurers when you're dead.
If you used "Search For Allies" and you die, you will automatically leave the battle.
If you used "Fixed Party" or "Don't Form Alliance", you'll enter spectator mode when you die.
You can't fight while in spectator mode, so sit back and enjoy the show. Maybe you can learn a new thing or two.

300488.「フレンドか 同じチームに入っている\n チームメンバーが 修練に参加していれば:
If a friend or a team member of the same team participates in the training, you will be able to see the ranking of your score. You can
check the details of Great Demon King's high score record anytime from "View Record". Please check it out as well!

300489.「もし 難しい実績を達成したら\n オレっちが用意した 特別な報酬を\n 進呈し:
If you achieve a difficult achievement, you will receive a special reward that I have prepared for you! To see what kind of
achievements are available, please check the "Check Achievements" page. But until you get used to it, don't think too hard and join in
the training first!

300490.「職業について 注意点がある。\n 他の冒険者と 一緒に挑戦する場合は\n 必ず:
There are a few points to note about vocation. If you challenge with other adventurers, please make sure that you all challenge from
the same vocation. You may challenge with any vocation you wish, but please make sure that all members of your party and your alliance
partners are in the same vocation. For example, if the Great Demon King's vocation is a warrior, and you select "Search for alliance
partners automatically," only warrior adventurers will be found. Hmm? In the case of druids, only one spirit can be called per
party, even if they are all from the same vocation? No, that's not true! Here, everyone can summon a spirit. Of course, death master's
spirits and pirate's cannons can be summoned as well. Don't worry about it if you're going alone, but if you're going with other
adventurers, you'll all need to be in the same vocation. For other restrictions, please check the details in the "Challenge to the Valley
Boot Camp" section!

300491.「もう一度 遊び方を おさらいするんだな？\n<yesno><close>:
You like to go over how to play again?
<yesno><close>

300492.「……ん？ なんだか おかしいな。\n ちょっと 問題が起きているようだ。\n:
Huh? Something weird is going on. There seems
to be a problem. Try coming back later.
<end>

302899.「だが 大魔王様のチカラは まだまだ\n そんなものじゃ ないんだろう？\n さ:
Is that really all the power the Great Demon
King can muster? Keep striving for the top
and give it your all!
<bw_break>

303358.「ん？ パーティを組んでいるな。\n ヴァリーブートキャンプへの 参加は\n パ:
Oh, you're in a party. You'll have to ask the party leader to come and speak with me, then.
Either do that, or come back alone if you want to participate!

303359.「む？ 残念だが いまの大魔王様の職業では\n ヴァリーブートキャンプへの参加が:
Hm? Sorry, but your current vocation isn't allowed in Valley Boot Camp.
Sorry to say, but please come back to me when you've changed your vocation!

303360.「よう 大魔王様！\n ヴァリーブートキャンプに挑戦するのか？\n おっと その:
If it isn't the Great Demon King! Are you ready to take on Valley Boot Camp? Actually, before that...
I have a reward for you that you still haven't accepted. Here, take it.

305290.「……って 荷物が いっぱいじゃないか。\n <%sM_Fukuro>に 空きを:
...but it looks like you're carrying too much
stuff. Go empty out at least <%dM_Empty_Num> slots in
your <%sM_Fukuro>, then come back!
<end>

305291.「おっと。荷物が いっぱいになっちまったな。\n 悪いが <%sM_Fukuro:
Hey, it looks like you're carrying too much
stuff. Go empty out at least <%dM_Empty_Num> slots in
your <%sM_Fukuro>, then come back!
<end>

305293.「ん？ <%sM_ITEM>を\n 渡そうと思ったが すでに\n <%nM_WH:
Hmm? I was going to give you the <%sM_ITEM>, but you're already carrying <%dM_WHOLENUM> of them.
Since there's a maximum limit to the number of these you can carry, I can't give this to you. Come back after using some!

305294.「ん？ <%sM_ITEM>を <%nM_Reward_Num>こ\n 渡そうと:
Hmm? I was going to give you <%dM_Reward_Num> <%sM_ITEM>, but you're already carrying <%dM_WHOLENUM> of them.
Since there's a maximum limit to the number of these you can carry, I can't give these to you. Come back after using some!

305340.<pipipi_off>\n『<%sM_AchieveName>』の\n実績を達:
<pipipi_off>
You received <%sM_ITEM>
as a reward for achieving
"<%sM_AchieveName>"!<se_nots System 7>

305341.<pipipi_off>\n『<%sM_AchieveName>』の\n実績を達:
<pipipi_off>
You received <%dM_ITEMNUM> <%sM_ITEM>
as a reward for achieving
"<%sM_AchieveName>"!<se_nots System 7>

312445.「なんと！\n 大魔王様は まだ特訓が 受けられないのか！\n<br>\n「くわ:
What?! The Great Demon King hasn't even undergone special training yet?!
I'll skip the nitty gritty, but you won't be able to receive training stamps until you first undergo special training.
Of course, you can still participate without undergoing special training, if you want. Totally up to you!

312446.「むむっ？\n 大魔王様は すべての職業の特訓を \n 終えてしまっているようだ:
Oh? Has the Great Demon King reached the maximum number of training stamps in all vocations?!
Bravo! While I can't give you any training stamps, I still want to see the best you've got out there!

312447.「む？\n 大魔王様は 今の職業の特訓を \n 済ませてしまっているようだな。\:
Oh? It looks like you've completed your special training in your current vocation.
You can either switch to a different vocation that can still get training stamps, or stay as is. It's your call!

312448.「了解した！\n 他の職業になってから\n また 来てくれ！\n<end>:
Got it! Come back to me after you've changed
vocations!
<end>

312449.「ちょっと待ってくれ 大魔王様！\n 今の職業だと 特訓スタンプは得られないが\:
Wait a minute Great Demon King! I can't get the training stamp in my current vocation, is that a problem? You can try again when you're
in another vocation, or you can just keep trying. Good luck with that!

312450.「了解した！\n 特訓スタンプを得られる職業になってから\n また 来てくれ！\:
Roger that! Come back when you're in a
vocation where you can get a special training
stamp!
<end>

312451.「ん？ 大魔王様！\n 『特訓モード』になっていないが 大丈夫か？\n<br>\:
Hmm? Great Demon King! If the Great Demon King wants to get a training stamp, he can talk to Priest Zanara next to him and select "Switch
Training Mode"! If you don't need the training stamp, you can continue with the challenge.

312452.「了解した！\n 特訓モードに きりかえてから\n また 来てくれ！\n<end:
I understand! Please come back after you
change to training mode!
<end>

313490.「オレっちから 追加の報酬だ！\n 生き残った修練の時間に応じて\n 特訓スタン:
Here's an extra reward for you! You will receive a training stamp for each hour of training you have completed! However, you will
not receive a training stamp if you have not yet trained or if you have already completed training. If you want to get a training stamp,
please check your training stamps carefully before trying again!

317943.「今週のミッションは\n すべて終えてしまったようだな。\n また来週 挑戦して:
Looks like you've done all your missions for
the week. Try again next week!
<bw_break>

317944.「む！\n クリアしたミッションがあるようだな。\n 報酬は 忘れずに受け取って:
Mmm! Looks like you've completed your mission.
Don't forget to pick up your reward!
<bw_break>

317945.「おっと。 ウィークリーミッションの報酬が\n まだ 渡せてなかったみたいだ。\:
Oops. I guess I didn't give him the reward for
the weekly mission yet. Is it okay if I give
it to you with the current vocation?
<yesno><close>

317947.「ん？ それは もう渡したものだな。\n 報酬は 週に一度きりなんだ。\n<bw:
Hmm? That's what you already gave him. I only
get paid once a week.
<bw_break>

317948.「ん？ それは まだ渡せないな。\n ミッションをクリアしてくれ！\n<bw_b:
Hmm? I can't give you that yet. You have to
complete the mission!
<bw_break>

318298.「このミッションは クリアしているな！\n 今の職業で 渡しても問題ないか？\n:
You have cleared this mission! Is it okay if I
give it to you in the current vocation?
<yesno><close>

318301.<pipipi_off>\n<pc>は\n<%dGET_TOKKUN> こ の特:
<pipipi_off>
<pc> received <%dGET_TOKKUN> this
special training stamp!<se_nots System 7>

318302.<pipipi_off>\n『<%sM_WeeklyName>』の\nミッション:
<pipipi_off>
<%sM_ITEMNUM> is received as a reward for
completing the <%sM_WeeklyName> mission!<se_nots System 7>

318303.<pipipi_off>\n『<%sM_WeeklyName>』の\nミッション:
<pipipi_off>
Received <%dGET_EXP> EXP as a reward for
completing the <%sM_WeeklyName> mission!<se_nots System 7>

318304.<pipipi_off>\n『<%sM_WeeklyName>』の\nミッション:
<pipipi_off>
As a reward for completing the
<%sM_WeeklyName> mission, <%dGET_TATUZIN> P
master experience will be received!<se_nots System 7>

318305.<pipipi_off>\n『<%sM_WeeklyName>』の\nミッション:
<pipipi_off>
As a reward for completing the
<%sM_WeeklyName> mission, <%dGET_TOKKUN>
received this special training stamp!<se_nots System 7>

318529.「職業経験値が 上限に達しているから\n 渡せるのは ふくびき券と達人経験値だけ:
Since you've reached the maximum amount of experience in your vocation, I can only give you a Lottery Ticket and master experience,
but is that still a problem?

318530.「職業経験値が 上限に達しているから\n 渡せるのは ふくびき券だけに\n なる:
Since you've reached the maximum amount of experience in your vocation, I can only give you a Lottery Ticket, but is that still a
problem?

318531.「特訓スタンプが 上限に達しているから\n 渡せるのは ふくびき券と達人経験値だ:
Since you've reached the training stamp limit,
I can only give you Lottery Ticket and master
experience, but is that still a problem?
<yesno><close>

318532.「特訓スタンプが 上限に達しているから\n 渡せるのは ふくびき券だけに\n な:
Since you've reached the training stamp limit,
I can only give you a Lottery Ticket, but is
that still a problem?
<yesno><close>

319036.「ウィークリーミッションの内容が\n 更新されたぞ！\n 気が向いたら 確認して:
The Weekly Missions have been updated! Check
it out if you're so inclined!
<end>

319037.「週ごとに出されるミッションを\n クリアしたら 報酬を進呈しよう！\n<br>:
If you complete the weekly missions, you will receive a reward! You can check the contents of the missions from "View Weekly Missions".
First, check the contents of the missions and try the missions you can clear first!
